com.compendium.core.datamodel
Interface ICode

All Superinterfaces:
ICoreConstants, IIdObject, IPCObject, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Code
public interface ICode
extends IIdObject

The Code object represents a tag in Project Compendium. Tags are additional information elements attached to a particular node. They allow you to notionally group nodes with similar ideas or concepts. You can then use these tags to search for all nodes with certain tags. This is useful, for example, in investigating node and concept relationships between various views.
